system.description: The Commissar can execute a fallen soldier's comrade to inspire the wounded to fight on through sheer terror.
system.benefit: If a Player Character within weapon range falls below 0 Wounds, can make +0 Ballistic Test to shoot that PC's Comrade, if successful, Comrade dies, motivating the wounded Player Character to regain 1d5 Wounds.

rollConfig.description: Ballistic Skill test to execute Comrade

specialAbilities.name: Motivational Execution
specialAbilities.description: When a PC falls below 0 Wounds, make a BS test to shoot their Comrade. If successful, the Comrade dies and the wounded PC regains 1d5 Wounds.
